doc:
Martika https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Martika 0 Marta Marrero (born May 18, 1969), known as Martika, is an American singer-songwriter and actress, who released two internationally successful albums in the late 1980s and early 1990s, selling over four million copies worldwide. Her biggest hit was "Toy Soldiers" which peaked at number 1 for two weeks in the American charts in mid-1989. She also played Gloria for the first three seasons of a children musical show Kids Incorporated from 1984–1986 and performed its theme song. Marta_Marrero ( born May_18_,_1969 ) , known as Martika , is an_American_singer-songwriter_and_actress , who released two_internationally_successful_albums in the_late_1980s and early_1990s , selling over_four_million_copies worldwide . Her_biggest_hit was " Toy_Soldiers " which peaked at number_1 for two_weeks in the_American_charts in mid-1989 . She also played Gloria for the_first_three_seasons of a_children musical_show_Kids_Incorporated from 1984 – 1986 and performed its_theme_song .
